summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, dated August 10, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, and leave statuses (sick/annual) for correctional officers and other personnel. The document is significant as it provides a snapshot of staffing on the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell.

persons.name: Noel, T
persons.context: Listed as staff assigned to SHU #1 and involved in shift relief changes. Appears multiple times in the roster for post assignments and leave status.

persons.name: Thomas, M
persons.context: Listed as staff with assignments to SHU #2 and INTERNAL posts. Record shows multiple entries for sick/annual leave status changes.

events.title: MCC New York Daily Staff Roster
events.description: Standard daily assignment and shift roster for correctional staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: MCC NEW YORK NEW YORK, NY
keyFacts: This is a staff roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York dated August 10, 2019.
The document shows detailed shift assignments, post rotations, and leave statuses (sick/annual) for correctional officers.
Two specific officers are named: Noel, T and Thomas, M, with multiple entries showing their assignment changes.
The roster includes posts like SHU (Special Housing Unit), control rooms, visitation, lobbies, and attorney conference areas.
This document provides operational context for the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held at the time of his death.
